narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Keck Medical Center of Usc is a General Acute Care Hospital provider based in Los Angeles, CA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $36.7M in Medicaid payments across 234K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $36.7M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
